channel.title: Any way to get java or flash on a limited acc?
channel.description:
When i try to get java says i need admin. Is there any way arround this. Its no biggie im just on my school comp and wana watch soem youtube vids but it says i need java for flash both of which i need admin to DL.
Thanks in advance, OhMGee

item.title: Any way to get java or flash on a limited acc?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

1337h4x:

Most schools have Mac’s, so it probably wont work.

Most schools?

My old school has linux. My ICT teacher hates everything to do with microsoft. I was supprised alot of the tuts in the tut section for bypassing scool stuff, hacking school stuff was for microsoft comps. I’ve not seen any other school with linux as default OS, or macs for that matter.

I prefer windows because linux is a massive learning curv, and almost all software will work on windows. I have no idea why my ICT teacher uses windows, but he does from time to time. (He made the linux distros look line windows so students will find them easyer to work with(was just a little start bar on each distro, but he had like 10 distros installed on each comp ;p)).

Read full topic
item.source: Any way to get java or flash on a limited acc?

item.source: Any way to get java or flash on a limited acc?

item.title: Any way to get java or flash on a limited acc?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Boot up in safe mode(The “correct” way to do this is to press f8 when your comp has finished loading it’s kernal and before windows loads it’s kernal. The “best” way to do this is restart, keep pressing f8 until a screen comes up, you’ll know you got it.)

Anyways, you should see a screen saying somthing about safe-mode, if not press f8 again and choose to boot in safe mode. Press enter, wait then logon to the new “Administrator”(Don’t worry, you only see this in safe mode) account there, go to start, control panel, user accounts, your account and give yourself admin. Install java then make yourself a limmited account before your parents find out.

Read full topic
item.source: Any way to get java or flash on a limited acc?
